comment: Pre-review complete. CR-011 meets all criteria: (1) Purpose clearly states corrective action for INV-002 nonconformance. (2) Scope is precise - SOP-005 frontmatter only. (3) Rationale correctly references INV-002, violated requirements (SOP-001 Section 5.2, SOP-002 Section 8), and authorizing CR (CR-010). (4) Execution plan is complete with 5 items. (5) Proposed change is explicit and correct - adds revision_summary referencing CR-010. Traceability chain verified. Recommend pre-approval.

Post-review complete. All requirements per SOP-002 Section 7.3 verified: (1) All 5 execution items show status COMPLETE with evidence. (2) SOP-005 is EFFECTIVE at v2.0. (3) Direct verification of SOP-005 frontmatter confirms revision_summary field present: 'CR-010: Initial creation of Code Governance SOP'. Testing summary requirements verified. CAPA-001 from INV-002 successfully executed. Recommend post-approval.
